Class EditorIcons

java.lang.Object
  org.ajax4jsf.resource.InternetResourceBase

          org.richfaces.renderkit.html.images.EditorIcons
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.ajax4jsf.resource.InternetResource
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditorAdvancedThemeIcons, EditorSimpleThemeIcons
public abstract class EditorIcons
extends org.ajax4jsf.resource.Java2Dresource

Class with basic methods for drawing skinable icons for tinyMCE editor.

Author:
Alexandr Levkovsky

                                                      boolean selected,
                                                      boolean withoutSubBorders)
Method to paint icon background

Parameters:
colors - - icon colors
selected - - flag which defines either main or selected background color should be used in drawing
withoutSubBorders - - flag which defines either sub borders should be painted in icon
Returns:
buffered image
